(Unofficial) YaaniMail Chrome Extension
Current Features:
- Login (when captcha is not enabled) / Logout
- 2FA can be entered when enabled for the account
- Account's TR/EN language setting is applied
- Menu bar: a welcome text with account name and date, switch between inbox â€“ calendar - contact views
- Inbox unread mail count (opens mail in yaanimail website in a new tab on click)
- Last 5 unread mails with title and short fragment of content
- Refresh unread count to show as a badge
- Daily calendar events list (with title, date and location info)
- Opens event location in a new tab on click
- Create Event in a pop up modal
- Contacts with infinite scroll
- View contact details
- Contact e-mail addresses are routed with mail-to when clicked
- Current view is preserved on open/close extension window
